headline20: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 25 airports right now.
management45: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 25 airports right now. Engine anti-ice operations are flagged at Suceava Stefan cel Mare (SCV/LRSV). Across base airports: 10 critical, 11 high, 9 medium, 9 normal. Key bases needing attention include London Luton (LTN/EGGW), Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) and Chişinău (RMO/LUKK); plus 18 other bases. 9 additional base airports are at medium severity and should be monitored closely. At base airports, the dominant pattern is snow-related runway contamination risk, mist and low cloud base  — most notably around Suceava Stefan cel Mare (SCV/LRSV), Craiova (CRA/LRCV) and Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR). Network hotspots: Suceava Stefan cel Mare (SCV/LRSV), Treviso Antonio Canova (TSF/LIPH), Craiova (CRA/LRCV), Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt (BER/EDDB), Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH) and 20 others. Primary drivers: mist, low cloud base and snow / blowing snow. Expected impact is reduced runway capacity with higher delay and diversion risk, especially where visibility/RVR and cloud base are very low. Since the last update, 12 airports changed status, led by Suceava Stefan cel Mare (SCV/LRSV), Treviso Antonio Canova (TSF/LIPH), Craiova (CRA/LRCV) and 9 others.
detail90: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 25 airports right now. Base airports (focus): London Luton (LTN/EGGW) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 200 m, cloud base around 100 ft | Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) — CRIT: freezing fog; snow; cold-temperature performance penalties | Chişinău (RMO/LUKK) — HIGH: snow; cold-temperature performance penalties; visibility down to 2 km, cloud base around 600 ft | Timişoara Traian Vuia (TSR/LRTR) — CRIT: fog; visibility down to 300 m, RVR down to 500 m, cloud base around 100 ft; below alternate minima (current METAR) | Katowice Wojciech Korfanty (KTW/EPKT) — CRIT: fog; snow; runway contamination risk | Belgrade Nikola Tesla (BEG/LYBE) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 200 m, RVR down to 400 m, cloud base around 100 ft and 15 others. Worst affected now: Suceava Stefan cel Mare (SCV/LRSV) — CRIT: freezing fog; freezing precipitation / icing risk; runway contamination risk (drivers: engine anti-ice operations, low-visibility procedures (reduced capacity), runway visual range (RVR) constraints) | Treviso Antonio Canova (TSF/LIPH) — CRIT: fog; visibility down to 100 m, RVR down to 250 m, cloud base around 500 ft; below approach minima (current METAR) (drivers: low-visibility procedures (reduced capacity), runway visual range (RVR) constraints, approach minima limits) | Craiova (CRA/LRCV) — CRIT: fog; visibility down to 100 m, RVR down to 200 m, cloud base around 100 ft; below approach minima (current METAR) (drivers: low-visibility procedures (reduced capacity), runway visual range (RVR) constraints, approach minima limits) | Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt (BER/EDDB) — CRIT: freezing fog; snow; cold-temperature performance penalties (drivers: runway visual range (RVR) constraints, cold-temperature performance penalties, very low visibility) | Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH) — CRIT: mist; snow; visibility down to 2.5 km, cloud base around 300 ft (drivers: low ceilings, mist, snow/blowing snow) | Billund (BLL/EKBI) — CRIT: mist; snow; cold-temperature performance penalties (drivers: cold-temperature performance penalties, low ceilings, mist) and 19 others. Changed since last run: Suceava Stefan cel Mare (SCV/LRSV), Treviso Antonio Canova (TSF/LIPH), Craiova (CRA/LRCV), Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH), Billund (BLL/EKBI), Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD), Kraków John Paul II (KRK/EPKK), Katowice Wojciech Korfanty (KTW/EPKT), Lublin (LUZ/EPLB), Poznań-Ławica (POZ/EPPO) and 2 others.
